data.name: aflpp.list_tools
data.description: List AFL++ MCP tools and their short descriptions.

data.name: aflpp.help
data.description: Get detailed help for a tool (schema + description).

data.name: aflpp.version
data.description: Get AFL++ and server version information.

data.name: aflpp.init_workspace
data.description: Create a workspace under workspaces/<name> with standard subdirectories: in,out,targets,build,logs,dicts,repros,reports.

data.name: aflpp.detect_build_system
data.description: Detect a likely build system for a project path (heuristic).

data.name: aflpp.build_instrumented
data.description: Run a constrained build command with AFL++ compiler wrappers and copy the resulting artifact into the workspace targets/ directory.

data.name: aflpp.build_cmplog_variant
data.description: Build a CMPLOG-instrumented variant by setting AFL_LLVM_CMPLOG=1 during compilation (LLVM mode) and copy the artifact into the workspace targets/ directory.

data.name: aflpp.import_corpus
data.description: Import a seed corpus into workspaces/<ws>/in/<corpus_name> from a file or directory within the workspace root.

data.name: aflpp.list_corpus
data.description: Summarize a corpus directory (file count and total size).

data.name: aflpp.list_builtin_dictionaries
data.description: List AFL++ builtin dictionaries shipped in the AFLplusplus/dictionaries directory.

data.name: aflpp.attach_dictionary
data.description: Attach a dictionary file to a job name (stored as a job config to be used by start_fuzz).

data.name: aflpp.dry_run
data.description: Run a short harness validation directly against the target (not afl-fuzz): checks input mode, stability, and basic performance signals.

data.name: aflpp.showmap
data.description: Run afl-showmap for a single testcase and return a summary of the trace.

data.name: aflpp.preflight_checks
data.description: Run lightweight preflight checks before starting afl-fuzz (core_pattern, CPU scaling, corpus non-empty).

data.name: aflpp.start_fuzz
data.description: Start an afl-fuzz job in the workspace (non-blocking).

data.name: aflpp.start_fuzz_cluster
data.description: Start a multi-instance afl-fuzz campaign (master + secondary instances).

data.name: aflpp.stop_fuzz
data.description: Stop a running afl-fuzz job by PID (SIGTERM then SIGKILL).

data.name: aflpp.stop_fuzz_cluster
data.description: Stop a running afl-fuzz campaign by stopping all recorded instance PIDs.

data.name: aflpp.status
data.description: Get job status by parsing fuzzer_stats and queue/crashes/hangs counts (with deltas since last call).

data.name: aflpp.campaign_summary
data.description: Summarize a multi-instance campaign by parsing fuzzer_stats for each instance directory.

data.name: aflpp.generate_progress_plot
data.description: Generate an AFL++ progress plot for a job or campaign (wraps afl-plot).

data.name: aflpp.list_findings
data.description: List crash and hang findings with stable IDs and paths.

data.name: aflpp.repro_crash
data.description: Reproduce a finding by running the target command directly with the testcase; captures stdout/stderr and writes a repro bundle under repros/.

data.name: aflpp.crash_report
data.description: Write a crash report for a finding (dedup signature + repro info + sanitizer frames if present).

data.name: aflpp.minimize_corpus
data.description: Minimize a corpus using afl-cmin and store it as a new corpus directory in the workspace.

data.name: aflpp.minimize_testcase
data.description: Minimize a single testcase using afl-tmin and store the minimized testcase under repros/.

data.name: aflpp.build_instrumented
data.description: Run a constrained build command with AFL++ compiler wrappers and copy the resulting artifact into the workspace targets/ directory.

data.name: aflpp.import_corpus
data.description: Import a seed corpus into workspaces/<ws>/in/<corpus_name> from a file or directory within the workspace root.
